md:
giải nghĩa từ "ptv" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan, và các từ đồng nghĩa.

1. **ptv** (noun) - **Phương tiện vận tải** (means of transportation)

Example sentence: "The city has invested in developing its ptv system to reduce traffic congestion."

Related words: vehicle, transportation, traffic, infrastructure

Synonyms: transportation, vehicle, conveyance

2. **ptv** (abbreviation) - **Phương tiện truyền hình** (television station)

Example sentence: "PTV is a popular television station in Vietnam, broadcasting a wide range of programs."

Related words: TV, television, broadcast, media

Synonyms: TV station, broadcasting, media outlet

Note: The meaning of "ptv" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above explanations are two possible meanings of the abbreviation.
